name: Backtrack (itch) (destinos)
description:
Backtrack | Rewind Hit and Dodge

Play as a young guy and beat everything that confronts you, or you can dodge and kind to them. The goal is to gain a score as much as you can.

  • This game made for Brackey Game Jam 2020.2
  • I've made it for ~ 4-5 days.
  • My First Jam. also First game ever(which I've released into public)

Controls

  • W/A/S/D - move Up/Left/Down/Right over a 5 x 5 grid
  • Space - Attack
  • E - Open a Skill Bar (Unfortunately, I can't make it on time. There's only 1 Skill available ;-; )
  • R - Activate Rewind Mode

Backspace in Main Menu - Reset your personal best score (?)

Features

  • Play in an endless game and try to get a high score.
  • You can win each stage in 3 ways .(Natural/Genocide/Pacifist)
  • Have additional choices to gain more score.
  • Time Bar instead of turn count system. (similarly a turn = 1 second in game(not real time))

Arts/Coder/SFX/Design - Destinos (me)

Credits

  • BGM :  Patrick de Arteaga 

Special Thanks

  • Brackeys's Discord Community <3
